title: boo tanks
body: Sick of op tanks... add some balance... full magic pen runes, All magic pen items available on karthas and ult hits full tank maokai for 225 of his 5k+ HP and he he hits me, with full tank gear for 600 of my 2200 HP....   balance this... or you lose someone who spends a lot of  money in your store....... its stupid.

replies.body:
Tanks are meant to be kited. With {{item:3151}} {{item:3116}} {{item:3135}} {{item:3020}} (or any boots) you should be able to kite him. Use your wall if they get too close and when they are low enough you can finish it with a combo of a constant E + Q.

**Never** get close enough that a tank can attack you, they might not do much but you are squishy and they survive long enough that the damage will build up.

_All magic pen items available on karthas _

And there is your problem, you had no damage items. And he probably had a ton of magic resist.

Tanks have countered mages since the dawn of fantasy pvp games, just saying.
